Posts.Content: Skpitts wrote: I have completed 14 of my 25 rads already and my skin has been holding up pretty well so far.  But over the past few days I have noticed a feeling of constant tightness under my arm and along the side of my rt breast.  I am having tx in 3 spots....rt breast, clavical and underarm area due to 3 + nodes prior to my bi-lateral masc.  Anyone else have any of these symptoms with rad?  Could it be scar tissue build=up frpm surgery or a side effect from the radiation?  My rad onc suggested ibuprofen if needed and has put in an order for physical therapy too.  I do have full range of motion, just some weird feelings under my arm.  I hope it will go away after rads are done!~ Dx 10/26/2009, IDC, 3cm, Stage IIIA, Grade 3, ER-/PR-, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: 1/2 way done w/rads-tightness & uncomfortable Skpitts Skpitts

Posts.Content: Jan 1, 2010 09:17AM Skpitts wrote: 37, IDC, brc-, er-, her2+, 4 cm, 2 lymph nodes, no mets....undergoing chemo pre surgery (8 of 16 treatments done).
